duties_responsibilities.duty: Work hands-on with the team and other stakeholders to deliver quality software products that meet our customer’s requirements and needs.
Help business partners understand our iterative development approach and focus on delivering a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) through careful and deliberate prioritization.
Grow technical capabilities / expertise and provide guidance to other members on the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or similar technical discipline (Master's preferred)
GCP certifications or other comparable cloud certifications
